ram[ 0] = 32'B01010100000000000000000000000000; // begin file	  
ram[ 1] = 32'B00001000000000010000000000000101; // addi	$ra $zero 5
ram[ 2] = 32'B00001000000111110000000000011110; // addi	$sp $zero 30
ram[ 3] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000000100; // jump	main
ram[ 4] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	main
ram[ 5] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000010; // addi	$t0 $zero 2
ram[ 6] = 32'B00011100000010000000000000000000; // sw	$t0 0($zero)
ram[ 7] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000111; // addi	$t0 $zero 7
ram[ 8] = 32'B00011100000010000000000000000001; // sw	$t0 1($zero)
ram[ 9] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000001; // lw	$s1 1($zero)
ram[10] = 32'B00011100000101010000000000000010; // sw	$s1 2($zero)
ram[11] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000001; // addi	$t0 $zero 1
ram[12] = 32'B00011100000010000000000000000011; // sw	$t0 3($zero)
ram[13] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	L0
ram[14] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000000; // addi	$t0 $zero 0
ram[15] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000010; // lw	$s0 2($zero)
ram[16] = 32'B00111110100010000100100000000000; // sbt	$t1 $s0 $t0
ram[17] = 32'B00101001001000000000000000011011; // beq	$t1 0 L1
ram[18] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000011; // lw	$s0 3($zero)
ram[19] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000000; // lw	$s1 0($zero)
ram[20] = 32'B00000010100101010101000000000010; // mult	$t2 $s0 $s1
ram[21] = 32'B00011100000010100000000000000011; // sw	$t2 3($zero)
ram[22] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000001; // addi	$t0 $zero 1
ram[23] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000010; // lw	$s0 2($zero)
ram[24] = 32'B00000010100010000100100000000001; // sub	$t1 $s0 $t0
ram[25] = 32'B00011100000010010000000000000010; // sw	$t1 2($zero)
ram[26] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000001101; // jump	L0
ram[27] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	L1
ram[28] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000011; // lw	$s1 3($zero)
ram[29] = 32'B00001110101000100000000000000000; // move	$a0 $s1 
ram[30] = 32'B00100100010000000000000000000000; // out	$a0  
ram[31] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000011111; // halt	  
ram[32] = 32'B01110000000000000000000000000000; // set_pid	  
ram[33] = 32'B00011011101000000000000000000000; // lw	$zero $zero($s9)
ram[34] = 32'B01010011101111010000000000000001; // subi	$s9 $s9 1
ram[35] = 32'B01011000000000000000000000110010; // end file
